title: ORGANIC Rosehip Oil - 100% Pure & ECO Certified Organic - #1 Rosehip Oil - Great For Face, Dry Skin, Dermatitis, Brittle Nails, Psoriasis, Eczema, Dry Hair, Scars, Anti-Aging, & More! - Larger 1 oz Bottle - 100% Guaranteed to Work Wonders for Your Body!
